insert into cj_dw_table_col_info (dw_business_topic_domain, dw_data_schema, dw_data_table, dw_table_col_name, dw_table_belong_domain, dw_table_comment, dw_table_col_order, dw_table_col_type, dw_table_col_comment, dw_table_partition_flag, last_modify_dt, last_modify_by) values
(#{item.dwBusinessTopicDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwDataSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwDataTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableColName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableBelongDomain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableColOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableColType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTableColComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dwTablePartitionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastModifyDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
